title: Introduction to C Programming
details: Get started with the basics of C programming. Learn about variables, data types, and control structures in this introductory course.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the fascinating world of algorithms and problem-solving techniques. Master data structures and algorithm design principles.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Learn C++ programming with a focus on data structures and algorithms. Apply C++ concepts to solve real-world problems efficiently.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Delve into the fundamental data structures used in computer science. Build a strong foundation for software development.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Explore the world of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python. Create reusable code and solve complex problems.

title: Software Engineering
details: Gain insights into software engineering principles, methodologies, and best practices. Learn to build high-quality software.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Discover the world of cloud computing with AWS. Learn to deploy, manage, and scale applications in the cloud.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Master the art of database management with MySQL. Design efficient databases and write complex queries.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills with this hands-on course. Tackle challenging problems and develop creative solutions.
